keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will give the NHS the funding it needs.
Bring wages of NHS and private social care staff up by £2bn a year.
Invest and uplift the budget for education.
Labour will provide fair rules and reasonable management of migration.
Labour will invest in new affordable homes and increase housing provision.

mentions.candidate: I have lived in Coventry all my life. My family have lived in this area for generations.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Standing up for you in Coventry North East

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit: Giving you security at work.
issues.government: The Tories after austerity are out of touch and will give away a post-Brexit Britain.
issues.immigration: Labour will provide fair rules and reasonable management of migration.

community.content: Labour will invest in new affordable homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived in Coventry all my life. My family have lived in this area for generations. I want to continue to live locally because what happens in Coventry really matters to me.

endorsements.endorsement: Colleen will create educational facilities for the entire community.
Colleen will create more jobs opportunities for everyone.

quotes.text: We will guarantee the wages of every NHS and private social care worker in Coventry, and uplift the amount spent for education.

images.caption: Colleen Fletcher standing up for you

examples: Labour will give the NHS the funding it needs.
Bring wages of NHS and private social care staff up by £2bn a year.
Because I continue to live locally what happens in Coventry really matters to me.
Labour will invest in new affordable homes.
Standing up for you in Coventry North East.
Labour will give the NHS the funding it needs.
Brexit: Giving you security at work.
